channel.title: Null
channel.description:
I'm tired of everyone saying "omg nulls". Until you understand what null means don't say it.(which should basically go for all words)
Read up on this.
[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Null_(computer_programming)]http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Null_(computer_programming) [/url]

item.title: Null
item.dc:creator: @Explisionist Explisionist
item.description:
@Explisionist wrote:

nubster:

I don’t say OMG nulls, same thing happen on my friend’s server (which I’m owner on too) people always complain that there’s “5” nulls.

Read the date last posted “Reply #13 on: May 16, 2009, 09:09:21 pm »”
before you post please.

Read full topic

item.title: Null
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“xEnt, post:13, topic:278087”][quote author=Slave Scyth link=topic=367061.msg2786876#msg2786876 date=1242529014]

I’m tired of everyone saying “omg nulls”. Until you understand what null means don’t say it.(which should basically go for all words)

Read up on this.

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Null_(computer_programming)

[/quote]I agree. It’s like how people call methods voids.
It just sounds silly.

Shudup!! voids r 2 cool 4 you!!

Actually, booleans are cooler.

booleansAreCool = true;

boolean booleansAreCool = true;

At least initialize that booleans are cool, else the compiler will deny their coolness. =\

that is initializing it…

this thread is so fucking stupid, half if not all the people don’t know what they are talking about.[/quote]A compiler would pop up a “Variable type needed” error. It may be initializing, but not correctly.

L2Think pls.

Read full topic

item.title: Null
item.dc:creator: @vic_08 Vic_
item.description:
@vic_08 wrote:

Vic’s are better.

public vic better()
{
if (vic = better)
{
Message(“Vic’s are better, gg.”);
Gg = true;
ftl = false;
}
else if (vic = worse)
{
Message(“ERROR, vic cannot be worse then anything else.”);
}
}

Read full topic

item.description:

I’m tired of everyone saying “omg nulls”. Until you understand what null means don’t say it.(which should basically go for all words)

Read up on this.

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Null_(computer_programming)

[/quote]I agree. It’s like how people call methods voids.
It just sounds silly.

Shudup!! voids r 2 cool 4 you!!

Actually, booleans are cooler.

booleansAreCool = true;[/quote]

public void voidsrcool() {
    voidsRCool = true;
    booleansAreGay = true;
}

voids win.
